events.message: I placed an order last week but received the wrong item. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer's complaint was reviewed and identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item.
Support agent Mark has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the wrong item received by the customer.
Hello! I'm Mark from customer service. I understand you received the wrong product and want to return it. Iâ€™m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the attached photos clearly show that the item does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid return label to ship the wrong item back at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to cover the return shipping. That sounds good to me.
Your refund process has been started and the return label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and everything went smoothly with your return shipment.
As we have not heard back and the refund was successfully processed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
